newsitem.title: UK: Smiths buys U.S. Polyphaser, UK's Torin.
newsitem.headline: Smiths buys U.S. Polyphaser, UK's Torin.

text.p: British specialised industrial group Smiths Industries Plc said on Monday it had bought U.S. lightning protection group PolyPhaser Corp. and British ventilation company Torin Holdings Ltd for a total 33 million stg.
Smiths said in a statement the acquisitions would add more than 20 million stg to group sales and were expected to boost earnings in their first full year of operation.
Smiths said PolyPhaser, based near Reno, Nevada, employs 140 people and specialises in lightning protection components and systems for the wireless cellular telecoms industry.
Smiths said PolyPhaser had net assets of $7.2 million and made a $4 million operating profit last year.

Smiths said Torin designs and manufactures customised air movement systems and small electric motors for computers, business machines, and heating and ventilation equipment for industrial and domestic applications.
Torin employs 155 people and reported pre-tax profits 2.1 million stg.
